description: This table contains information about how the patient responsibility for the claim was calculated.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLAIM_PX_LINE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the line number in related group 710 that this detail line corresponds to. If blank, then the patient responsibility detail on this line is for DRG reimbursement.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: Stores the service type associated with the benefits on this line. If coverage level benefits are used, then the service type will be blank.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: SERVICE_TYPE_SOURCE_DESC
columns.description: Stores a description of how the service type was calculated for the line.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the amount of deductible that was applied to this line.

columns.name: COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the amount of copay that was applied to this line.

columns.name: COINSURANCE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the amount of coinsurance that was applied to this line.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the amount that was not covered by insurance on this line.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason that the not covered amount is not covered by insurance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Noncovered procedure


Lifetime insurance maximum reached


Annual insurance maximum reached


Visit insurance maximum reached

columns.name: ANNUAL_MOOP_CONTRIB_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the amount that this line contributed to the maximum out of pocked accumulation.

columns.name: VISIT_MOOP_CONTRIB_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the amount that this line contributed to the maximum visit out of pocked accumulation.

columns.name: OUT_OF_POCKET_LMT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason that the out-of-pocket maximum limited the patient responsibility for the current line. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Annual out-of-pocket max met on a previous line


Visit out-of-pocket max met on a previous line


Annual and visit out-of-pocket max met on a previous line


Annual out-of-pocket max met on the current line


Visit out-of-pocket max met on the current line


Annual and visit out-of-pocket max met on the current line
